name: Pinball Arcade PS Vita
description:
Tales of the Arabian Nights®, Ripley's Believe It or Not®, Theatre of Magic®, and Black Hole™ are available from within the game.

Each month, regular updates will add classics like Monster Bash®, Medieval Madness®, Creature from the Black Lagoon®, Funhouse®, Attack from Mars®, Black Knight®, Space Shuttle®, Pin•Bot®, Circus Voltaire®, Big Shot®, (and many others for years to come!) along with online tournaments and additional modes to challenge yourself and compete against your friends.

Our goal is for the Pinball Arcade to become the most realistic and comprehensive pinball game ever created!

Purchasing this content entitles you to both the PS3 system and PS Vita system versions!

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1-4 player(s)
Network Features
2048KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Rear Touch Pad
Dual Analog Sticks
